title: Riot Games Support Response Time
body: I submitted a ticket at 7:50 PM EST on Wednesday, it's now 11:51 AM EST on Sunday and still have yet to receive a response. I would appreciate someone taking a look at my ticket. Thank you.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, we've been pretty overloaded with tickets as of late. Our specialists are working their butts off to get to everyone as soon as possible. With your continued patience, we'll have someone with you soon.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
